SourceString: Welcome to the Casino, a gambler's\nparadise! This is the Casino Token\nCounter.
You can purchase Casino Tokens up to a\nmaximum of 1000 tokens held.

You can buy up to a maximum of 1000 held\nTokens. 1 Token is {Gold} Gold.\nHow many would you like to buy?
{Casinocoin} Tokens? That'll be {Gold} Gold.\nIs that okay?\n<yesno><break>
Hehe, thank you. May the goddess of\nfortune smile upon you!
...Oh. It seems you are already carrying\n1000 or more Casino Tokens.
I apologize, but you cannot buy any\nCasino Tokens if you are carrying over\n1000 tokens.
If you run low on Tokens for any reason,\nplease come back and see me.
How many?
All
Thank you for using our service. Please\ncome back anytime.
That will be {required} Tokens to exchange for that. \nIs that okay?
You don't have enough Casino Tokens to exchange for that. \nPlease choose another item.
The {itemname} now belongs to {pc}!
{pc} received {itemname}!
Are there any other items you'd like to exchange?
Here you can exchange your Casino Tokens for prizes.

Thank you for your visit. We look forward to \nserving you again.

If there's anything here you're interested in, I'll exchange it to you for Casino Tokens. However, items marked in blue
can only be exchanged for once.
